sentence.Network_en: The musician and the librettist were collaborators.

sentence.Network_en: Italian - born American composer and librettist whose operas include The Medium ( 1946 ) and The Consul ( 1950 ).

entry.def: A librettist is a person who writes the words that are used in an opera or musical play.

means.word_mean: 1. author of words to be set to music in an opera or operetta
